channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Several new members of Congress will make LGBTQ history
item.description: Three history-making, newly elected lawmakers representing the LGBTQ community will be sworn in to the 119th Congress Friday.

item.description: Street performers and football fans returned to New Orleans streets as the city inched back toward normalcy.

item.title: US Steel acquisition by Japan’s Nippon blocked
item.description: Domestic steel production is essential to U.S. security, Biden said.

item.title: Thai PM declares luxury handbags, watches among $400 million in assets
item.description: Thailand's youngest-ever leader has more than 200 designer handbags worth over $2 million, as well as property in London and Japan, her party said.
